title: Switch global background theme from bright cyan to bright magenta

requirements.summary: Update global CSS variable color tokens so app background and related surfaces use a bright magenta theme in both light and dark modes while preserving readable contrast.
acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the page/body background renders as bright magenta (not cyan) across the app.
In dark mode, the page/body background renders as a magenta-themed dark variant (not cyan) across the app.
Text and key UI surfaces (cards/popovers) remain clearly readable against the new magenta background (no low-contrast foreground).

file_operations.description: Replace the current cyan OKLCH tokens with a magenta-based palette for both :root (light) and .dark (dark), updating `--background` and directly related surface tokens (`--card`, `--popover`, `--border`, `--input`, `--ring`) plus any necessary foreground counterparts (`--foreground`, `--card-foreground`, `--popover-foreground`) to maintain strong contrast/readability. Ensure the Tailwind CSS variable contract remains intact (these variables are consumed by Tailwind theme colors and shadcn-ui styling); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
